Reviews.Title: quite good
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: the camera is quite good, especially for SLR beginners like me. But to be honest, in P mode, or Indoor Scene mode when use indoor, it takes a relatively long time lag to focus. that is the only problem i found at present.

Reviews.Title: A great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jane Ann Knowles
Reviews.Content: I had read about the D7000 for a long time ...so when the D7100 came out I could resist no longer.  I am not a professional at all...but of the pictures I've taken...so many of them are sharp and clear and exactly what I wanted in a camera.  I am still learning all the features and know with time and practice I'll achieve a much higher quality of camera.  I have been pleased with the 18 - 140 zoom lens.  Plan to enjoy this camera for many years to come!!

Reviews.Title: New Camere
Reviews.Author: Joe O.
Reviews.Content: I need more time to get the hang of this camera I have look at camera for  years I was looking at the canon but at the last min I got the Nikon

Reviews.Title: Nikon D7100
Reviews.Author: Jerry Milsap
Reviews.Content: I really haven't had a chance to explore my new camera. I will update you after I get to use it during the upcoming year. It looks to be absolutely amazing.Jerry Milsap
